document.full_text: glencore , the global commodities trading giant, is set to appear before the listing committee of the hong kong stock exchange this week to seek approval for a planned initial public offering, sources with direct knowledge of the plans told reuters on monday.
document.title: glencore to seek approval in hk this week for ipo: sources
lines_and_colors: glencore , the global commodities trading giant, is set to appear before the listing committee of the hong kong stock exchange this week to seek approval for a planned initial public offering, sources with direct knowledge of the plans told reuters on monday.
